products.name: Copper Pour Over Kit
products.description: Handcrafted copper dripper paired with a matching kettle for precision brewing.

reviews.text: Looks stunning on my counter and brews clean cups.
Beautiful but kettle lid gets hot.

products.name: Nano Espresso Scale
products.description: Rechargeable espresso scale with 0.1g accuracy and auto-tare timer.

reviews.text: Helps me dial in consistently every morning.

products.name: Glass Cold Brew Bottle
products.description: 1L heat-tempered glass bottle with reusable stainless filter for smooth cold brew.

reviews.text: Makes enough concentrate for the week, super easy cleanup.
Wish it shipped with spare gaskets.

products.name: Walnut Handle Tamper
products.description: 58.5mm stainless base with hand-turned walnut handle for even puck prep.

reviews.text: Weight feels balanced and fits my VST baskets perfectly.

products.name: Magnetic Milk Frother
products.description: USB-C rechargeable frother with dual-speed magnetic whisk for silky microfoam.

reviews.text: Great for quick flat whites when I skip the steam wand.
Battery lasts a week of daily use.

products.name: Vacuum Travel Mug
products.description: 12oz leak-proof vacuum mug with ceramic-coated interior to preserve flavor.

reviews.text: Keeps my pour over hot on the commute without metallic taste.

products.name: Canvas Barista Apron
products.description: Waxed canvas apron with leather straps and tool pockets for busy bars.

reviews.text: Repels stains and the cross-back straps save my neck.

products.name: Countertop Knock Box
products.description: Rubber-damped knock bar with removable stainless liner for easy emptying.

reviews.text: Compact enough for my tiny cart but still catches every puck.

products.name: Folded Filter Pack
products.description: Pre-rinsed and folded paper filters sized for 02 drippers, 200 pack.

reviews.text: Nice to skip folding in a rush, papers are neutral-tasting.

products.name: Airtight Bean Canister
products.description: Vacuum-sealed glass canister with calendar wheel for roast tracking.

reviews.text: Valve releases with a satisfying click and keeps beans fresh longer.
Wish there was a larger size for 2lb bags.

products.name: Espresso Cleaner Tablets
products.description: Backflush cleaning tablets that dissolve fast and rinse residue-free.

reviews.text: One tablet per week keeps my group head spotless.

products.name: Smart Gooseneck Kettle
products.description: Bluetooth kettle with 1200W heating and PID control for precise pours.

reviews.text: App lets me save bloom temps for each roast.
Spout is smooth but lid hinge feels delicate.

products.name: Cupping Spoon Set
products.description: Pair of silver-plated spoons with deep bowls and etched fill lines.

reviews.text: Perfect weight and the etched line helps during flights.

products.name: Instant Read Thermometer
products.description: Waterproof thermometer with swivel probe and magnetic mount.

reviews.text: Helps me hit 96C for bloom every time.

products.name: Stainless Puck Screen
products.description: 0.2mm mesh screen for even dispersion and cleaner group heads.

reviews.text: Great channeling insurance on light roasts.

products.name: Dosing Funnel Pro
products.description: Magnetic 58mm dosing funnel that snaps to the portafilter for zero mess.

reviews.text: Magnets align quickly and let me WDT without spills.

products.name: Station Drip Mat
products.description: Silicone mat with raised grooves sized for scales and portafilters.

reviews.text: Protects my walnut bar and rinses clean under the tap.

products.name: Double Wall Espresso Glasses
products.description: Set of two 90ml borosilicate glasses that keep shots hot without burning fingers.

reviews.text: Crema hangs around longer compared to my ceramics.

products.name: Burr Cleaning Brush
products.description: Goat-hair bristles on a beech handle sized to sweep flat and conical burrs.

reviews.text: Keeps my EK43 tidy without scratching the burrs.

products.name: Water Mineral Kit
products.description: Single-dose mineral packets to build ideal brew water in 1L increments.

reviews.text: Brings clarity to my washed Ethiopians using distilled water.
Wish the packets were compostable, otherwise perfect.
